column3: maybe it was because I went on a Monday and I got reheated goods from the weekend but I was disappointed with the tenderness of the meat. The pork ribs were chewy and hard. The brisket was crumbly. Loved the flavor but was hoping they'd have pulled it off the grill considerably earlier.
